SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into five_ed_product_detail (product_id, build_name, major_name, draw_no, construction_area, dept_id, dept_name, copy_count, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4, remark5, remark6, remark7, seq) values (#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buildName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drawNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{constructionArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{copyCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update five_ed_product_detail set product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, build_name = #{buildName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major_name = #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, draw_no = #{drawNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, construction_area = #{constructionArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, copy_count = #{copyCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark3 = #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark4 = #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark5 = #{remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark6 = #{remark6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark7 = #{remark7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, product_id, build_name, major_name, draw_no, construction_area, dept_id, dept_name, copy_count, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4, remark5, remark6, remark7, seq from five_ed_product_detail where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, product_id, build_name, major_name, draw_no, construction_area, dept_id, dept_name, copy_count, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4, remark5, remark6, remark7, seq from five_ed_product_detail
order by id desc
